p: To recap, the AMIP5/CMIP5 ensemble regression relationship results are: (R1) a strong negative correlation ( r = −0.66) of CMIP5-AMIP5 net flux biases on SST biases, i.e. ∆F R on ∆T; (R2) a strong positive correlation ( r = 0.84) of CMIP5 SST biases on AMIP5 net flux biases, i.e. ∆T on ∆F A; (R3) a strong negative correlation ( r = −0.84) of CMIP5-AMIP5 net flux biases on AMIP5 net flux biases, i.e. ∆F R on ∆ F A; and (R4) a weak correlation ( r = 0.35) of CMIP5 SST biases on CMIP5 net flux biases, i.e. ∆ T on ∆ F (where ∆ F = ∆ F A + ∆ F R).
